sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT T1.CHRGE_KND , MIN(T2.CODE_NM) AS CHRGE_KND_NM , SUM(T1.FEE) AS SUM_FEE , SUM(T1.VAT) AS SUM_VAT , SUM(T1.NTIC_AMT) AS SUM_NTIC_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN T3.RCVD_TP IN ('2','3') THEN T1.NTIC_AMT END) AS SUM_RCVD_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN T3.RCVD_TP IN ('2','3') THEN 0 ELSE T1.NTIC_AMT END) AS SUM_NOT_RCVD_AMT FROM LEV_REQEST_F T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE T2 ON ('GAM024'=T2.CODE_ID AND T1.CHRGE_KND=T2.CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN PAYEOSU.REV_COLL_F@YGPA_PORTMIS T3 ON (T1.PRT_AT_CODE=T3.PRT_AT_CODE AND T1.CHRGE_KND=T3.FEE_TP AND T1.ACCNUT_YEAR=T3.FISCAL_YR AND T1.NTICNO=T3.BILL_NO) WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.NTIC_PD_FROM >= TO_DATE(#sGrUsagePdFrom#||'000000','yyyy-mm-ddhh24miss') AND T1.NTIC_PD_FROM <= TO_DATE(#sGrUsagePdTo#||'235959','yyyy-mm-ddhh24miss')
AND T1.PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND T1.ENTRPSCD = #sEntrpscd#
AND T1.CHRGE_KND = #sChrgeKnd#
GROUP BY T1.CHRGE_KND ORDER BY MIN(T2.CODE_NM) ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM ( SELECT T1.CHRGE_KND , MIN(T2.CODE_NM) AS CHRGE_KND_NM , SUM(T1.FEE) AS SUM_FEE , SUM(T1.VAT) AS SUM_VAT , SUM(T1.NTIC_AMT) AS SUM_NTIC_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN T3.RCVD_TP IN ('2','3') THEN T1.NTIC_AMT END) AS SUM_RCVD_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN T3.RCVD_TP IN ('2','3') THEN 0 ELSE T1.NTIC_AMT END) AS SUM_NOT_RCVD_AMT FROM LEV_REQEST_F T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE T2 ON ('GAM024'=T2.CODE_ID AND T1.CHRGE_KND=T2.CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN PAYEOSU.REV_COLL_F@YGPA_PORTMIS T3 ON (T1.PRT_AT_CODE=T3.PRT_AT_CODE AND T1.CHRGE_KND=T3.FEE_TP AND T1.ACCNUT_YEAR=T3.FISCAL_YR AND T1.NTICNO=T3.BILL_NO) WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.NTIC_PD_FROM >= TO_DATE(#sGrUsagePdFrom#||'000000','yyyy-mm-ddhh24miss') AND T1.NTIC_PD_FROM <= TO_DATE(#sGrUsagePdTo#||'235959','yyyy-mm-ddhh24miss')
AND T1.PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND T1.ENTRPSCD = #sEntrpscd#
AND T1.CHRGE_KND = #sChrgeKnd#
GROUP BY T1.CHRGE_KND ORDER BY MIN(T2.CODE_NM) )

SELECT TRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(COUNT(*),0), '999,999,999,999')) TOT_SUM_CNT , TRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(SUM_NTIC_AMT),0), '999,999,999,999')) TOT_SUM_NTIC_AMT , TRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(SUM_RCVD_AMT),0), '999,999,999,999')) TOT_SUM_RCVD_AMT , TRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(SUM_NOT_RCVD_AMT),0), '999,999,999,999')) TOT_SUM_NOT_RCVD_AMT FROM ( SELECT T1.CHRGE_KND , MIN(T2.CODE_NM) AS CHRGE_KND_NM , SUM(T1.FEE) AS SUM_FEE , SUM(T1.VAT) AS SUM_VAT , SUM(T1.NTIC_AMT) AS SUM_NTIC_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN T3.RCVD_TP IN ('2','3') THEN T1.NTIC_AMT END) AS SUM_RCVD_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN T3.RCVD_TP IN ('2','3') THEN 0 ELSE T1.NTIC_AMT END) AS SUM_NOT_RCVD_AMT FROM LEV_REQEST_F T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE T2 ON ('GAM024'=T2.CODE_ID AND T1.CHRGE_KND=T2.CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN PAYEOSU.REV_COLL_F@YGPA_PORTMIS T3 ON (T1.PRT_AT_CODE=T3.PRT_AT_CODE AND T1.CHRGE_KND=T3.FEE_TP AND T1.ACCNUT_YEAR=T3.FISCAL_YR AND T1.NTICNO=T3.BILL_NO) WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.NTIC_PD_FROM >= TO_DATE(#sGrUsagePdFrom#||'000000','yyyy-mm-ddhh24miss') AND T1.NTIC_PD_FROM <= TO_DATE(#sGrUsagePdTo#||'235959','yyyy-mm-ddhh24miss')
AND T1.PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND T1.ENTRPSCD = #sEntrpscd#
AND T1.CHRGE_KND = #sChrgeKnd#
GROUP BY T1.CHRGE_KND ORDER BY MIN(T2.CODE_NM) )
